title: Golden Globes: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Lands 3 Nominations, Including Best Song for ‘Golden’ and Animated Feature
summary: The musical sensation that is “KPop Demon Hunters” has nabbed three Golden Globe nominations including best animated film, cinematic and box office achievement and original song for “Golden.” “Golden” — performed by Huntr/x (EJAE, Audrey Nuna and Rei Ami) and written by EJAE, Mark Sonnenblick, DO, …

title: Wagner Moura Becomes First Brazilian Male Actor Nominated in Lead Drama Category at Golden Globes
summary: Wagner Moura has made Golden Globes history, becoming the first Brazilian man ever nominated for lead actor in a drama for his performance in Kleber Mendonça Filho’s “The Secret Agent.” The nomination marks a landmark moment for Brazilian representation at the Globes, where performers from the coun…

title: Cynthia Erivo Makes Golden Globes History as First Black Woman to Earn Two Lead Actress (Comedy) Nominations
summary: No good deed goes unpunished, especially in awards season. Cynthia Erivo has made Golden Globes history, becoming the first Black woman nominated twice in the lead actress (comedy or musical) category. The recognition comes for her towering performance as Elphaba in Jon M. Chu’s box office smash “W…
